name: Trial of the Runes
description:
This game was made for the Untitled Game Jam #75 here on itch.io.
The theme was "otherworldly".

Game Description:
You were summoned into an otherworldly realm. In order to return to your world you need to find the four magical runestones which are scattered around this forsaken land.

Special thanks go to:
Sytny Studios - All low poly art
Render Knight - FREE Skybox Asset
Benjamin Tissot - Music (Song called "Evolution")
